name: Frog to the Moon NG
description:
-Controls- 

(Arrows):  Move - menu navigation
(Left and right air):  Jump in the pressed direction
(X or Up):  Jump
(Enter):  Pause menu - menu confirmation
(R): Reset
               + and  -  number pad buttons can skip layouts, only for beta use

Eat cherries for extra jumps
Help a little frog achieve it's dream of reaching the moon
